name: OnePieceMaster
short: Ultimate One Piece engagement system with challenges and trivia
description: A comprehensive One Piece themed engagement system that brings your server to life with daily challenges, multi-difficulty trivia, auto-posting features, point systems, leaderboards, and achievements. Features 300+ pieces of pre-loaded content including challenges for every day of the week, trivia questions from easy to legendary difficulty, and a massive database of One Piece characters and Devil Fruits. Perfect for One Piece servers looking to maximize member engagement with minimal setup and maintenance.
author: UltPanda
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data including points earned, trivia statistics (correct/attempted answers), daily participation streaks, earned achievements, and challenge participation history. This data is used to track user progress, calculate rankings, display leaderboards, and provide a gamified experience. Users can request deletion of their data through the bot owner or by leaving all servers where the bot is present.
install_msg:
🏴‍☠️ **Welcome to the Grand Line!** 🏴‍☠️

One Piece Master has been installed successfully! This cog brings the ultimate One Piece experience to your server with:

📅 **Daily Challenges** - Themed prompts, discussions, and activities
🧠 **Multi-Difficulty Trivia** - From rookie to Pirate King level
⚡ **Auto Trivia** - Automatic surprise trivia sessions
🏆 **Rankings & Achievements** - Earn berries and climb the ranks
📊 **Leaderboards** - Compete with your nakama

**Quick Setup:**
1. `[p]op challenges channel #your-challenge-channel`
2. `[p]op trivia_admin channel #your-trivia-channel`
3. `[p]op challenges force daily` (to test)
4. `[p]op trivia_admin toggle` (to enable auto trivia)

**Pre-loaded Content:**
✅ 75+ Daily Challenges across 7 categories
✅ 200+ Trivia Questions (4 difficulty levels)
✅ 150+ Characters in database
✅ 100+ Devil Fruits catalogued
✅ Themed weeks and seasonal events

Use `[p]help OnePieceMaster` to see all commands. Set sail and become the Pirate King! ⚓
